CHAT.comment: CLACKAMAS GASTROENTEROLOGY ASSOCIATION, P.C., Petitioner v. DEBORAH WELLS
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:59 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF STEVEN W. SEYMOUR ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF IRVING L. GORNSTEIN FOR THE UNITED STATES, AS AMICUS CURIAE, SUPPORTING THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF CRAIG A. CRISPIN ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF STEVEN W. SEYMOUR ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 11:48 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
